resources.string: Press the draft button to embody a player in an in-game situation. Your opponent will simultaneously draft a player to play against you. If you think your player can defeat the computer player in this in game situation press play to see if you are correct. If you aren\'t feeling confident about the result, just hit the Off the Glass button to prove your cowardice. You\'ll get a message to tell you if you were correct to dump the puck.
